sections.description: Fashion Shop is a user-friendly and powerful WordPress theme. This is a fully responsive WooCommerce-ready theme. The theme has many useful and pleasant options that will help you create a fashion store website on WordPress as quickly and easily as possible. The top bar, header, pages, and footer have different layouts so you can choose the one you like best and change the design of your website. The Fashion Shop WordPress theme comes with a built-in custom homepage that is well-designed and will enhance the design of your website or store. To enable a custom home page, you need to go to the theme settings page and enable this option. By the way, on the Homepage Settings page, you also need to check the "Your homepage displays" option and make sure it is set to “Your latest posts”. If you have already set it to "A static page", you will need to change it. Only in this case, the custom homepage will be displayed on the main page of your website. Our Fashion Store theme's built-in custom homepage has various sections that will enhance the appearance of your homepage and make it more attractive to your visitors.  The main section is the Banner section with headings, sliding texts, buttons, and animated images. All elements are customizable, so you can use the default images and designs or change them to your own. Another beautiful section is the Call to Action section. This one is also fully customizable. The Latest Posts section is also personalized specifically for the homepage and looks different than on the blog/search page. The premium version of Fashion Shop has even more built-in sections. By the way, the premium version comes with more great options (such as animations, hover effects, additional settings for WooCommerce, and much more) that will improve the design and functionality of your website. WordPress Fashion Shop theme also comes with five built-in footer themes and four different footer layouts. This means you can change the design and position of the elements in the footer and make it look the way you want. In short, the theme has all the necessary features to quickly create a beautiful fashion store.
